title: Slave Diaries
description: Some find pleasure in domination and some enjoy getting dominated, and it’s pointless to find the reason for either of their choices.Kira, a girl of 22, was living a dual life, one where she was a pretty lady with dreams, and in another where she wanted someone whose feet was safe enough to submit everything she had. author: S.M. Kira
